backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a contact message system with owner-based access control, message CRUD operations, and hardcoded contact information retrieval for AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of contact section updates with specific phone numbers, email, and address details.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing component responsibilities, styling approach, and data flow patterns.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode color tokens for an industrial-themed design palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page title to 'AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES' and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping HomePage with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section component displaying owner name, company description, and four feature cards highlighting quality, expertise, pricing, and trust.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form with validation, state management, and backend integration using React Query mutation to submit messages with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section displaying company contact details (two phone numbers, email, address with pincode) fetched from backend alongside an integrated contact form.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, company name, navigation menu, and mobile-responsive hamburger menu implementing smooth scroll navigation.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component displaying the main banner for Akanksha Enterprises with company name, tagline, call-to-action buttons, and smooth scroll navigation to contact and services sections.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Reusable card component that displays a service with an icon, title, and description, featuring hover effects and transitions.
Services section component that displays a grid of 8 scrap trading service categories (metal, paper, plastic, e-waste, automotive, industrial, construction, electrical) using ServiceCard components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React Query hooks for fetching contact info, submitting messages, and retrieving all messages from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using an earthy, industrial color palette with forest green as primary.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component that composes Header, Footer, HeroSection, AboutSection, ServicesSection, and ContactSection into a full-page layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including container settings, font families, OKLCH color system, border radius variables, shadows, and animations with typography and container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a scrap trading website for AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES owned by Bhupendra Singh Chandel. Contains existing features (homepage, about, services, contact sections with professional B2B theme) and pending feature requests including logo integration.
